Method Detail

prepare

protected void prepare()
Description copied from class: AbstractStandardXComponent
A processing hook for AbstractStandardXComponent.update(XTime) in the StandardXClock.StandardTimePhase.PREPARE phase.

By default, gets all foreign data, but may be overriden by specializations of AbstractStandardXComponent.

Overrides:
prepare in class AbstractStandardXComponent
